subject: Order #SSN5033
description_text:
Hi

 

I'm confused by the amount of shipments I see on my account. I got an alert
today that a package was delivered to Cincinnati? My address is in
California. And the VAM motors are still in China?

 

Can  I get some clarification please?

 

Thanks,

conversations.body_text: Hi Contact,  Most likely, the pedals were shipped from our U.S. warehouse, while the VAM Pro motors were shipped from China, so they were sent in separate packages.

That’s great. Any idea when they might arrive? Just checked tracking and it’s coming up unknown. 


Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Contact,     I can see that the pedals have already been delivered. Here is the shipping tracking information for the VAM Pro:

Ah great. For some reason 17track was giving me an error on their website and I can’t see any of the information you have in your screen shot. 

Thanks!

Sent from my iPhone

>
